itunes:title: #130: When They Undervalue You on Valentine's Day (or you Birthday, Anniversary, Etc...)
title: #130: When They Undervalue You on Valentine's Day (or you Birthday, Anniversary, Etc...)
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: It is totally okay for you if the holidays are important for you in a relationship. You deserve to feel special. This episode is in support of women who may have felt overlooked and forgotten by partners on special holidays like Valentine's Day,...
itunes:summary:
It is totally okay for you if the holidays are important for you in a relationship. You deserve to feel special.

This episode is in support of women who may have felt overlooked and forgotten by partners on special holidays like Valentine's Day, Birthdays, Anniversaries, and others habitually.

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
